p: In this study, to investigate the relationship between FAD2 and the content of FAs and total oil in seeds, the evolution, biocatalysis, and site-directed mutation of FAD2s were analyzed in detail. The comprehensive evolutionary relationship of FAD2 genes was reconstructed and their gene structures were also analyzed. Then, the catalytic activities of FAD2s in different seed plants were compared, and the site-directed mutation was also used to reveal their mechanism of catalytic activity.
